events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product doesn’t match what I ordered.
The support system has identified this case as related to a refund request based on the customer's description of receiving an incorrect product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request to provide personalized assistance and help resolve the issue quickly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to assist you with the refund process and get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and the order number so I can verify the mistake and process your refund?
Here is the photo of the item I received. The order number is 123456. I hope this helps speed up the refund process.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund, which should be processed within 5 business days. Please keep the item as we don’t require a return.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate that I don’t have to send the item back and that the refund is processing already.
Your refund case has been resolved successfully. Please allow a few business days for the amount to appear in your account.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
The case has now been formally closed as resolved. Thank you for contacting support and we hope to serve you better in the future.
